title: Ping has been jumping around for the past few patches.
body: Every time i move or use an ability it jumps from like 60 to 90 or spikes to 150 sometimes. It constantly moves around never stays at the same number. Called my ISP and they couldn't find any problems.

replies.body:
Hmmmm with your ping jumping around that much it almost makes me think that you might be having some packet loss issues. Let's check for that really quick since it's so simple, and that will decide how we should go about fixing your ping. 

Hit up our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and toss in some game logs where you had ping spikes. Take a screenshot of what the image it gives you using something like Gyazo and post it here for us to go over together!

https://gyazo.com/026667dc376cbaa8718e08e1bad3c1db.png

Yeah.. packet loss for sure lol.
My normal ping is around 50.

Eep! Yea that's definitely no good =\ .

Our tech guys might be able to help out, but there's always a chance that packet loss is coming from your ISP. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and you'll be in good hands there!
